name: CAN Bus Message Injection
description: Attacker injects malicious messages onto the CAN bus to control vehicle functions
description_zh: 攻击者向CAN总线注入恶意消息以控制车辆功能
prerequisites: Physical or remote access to CAN bus
attack_steps:
1. Gain access to CAN bus
2. Analyze CAN message format
3. Inject malicious messages
4. Control target ECU functions
mitigations: Message authentication, Intrusion detection, Network segmentation

name: OBD-II Port Exploitation
description: Attacker uses OBD-II port to access vehicle networks and systems
description_zh: 攻击者使用OBD-II端口访问车辆网络和系统
attack_steps:
1. Connect to OBD-II port
2. Enumerate available services
3. Bypass authentication if present
4. Access vehicle systems
mitigations: OBD-II port protection, Authentication, Access logging

name: Wireless Key Fob Relay Attack
description: Attacker relays key fob signals to unlock and start vehicle
description_zh: 攻击者中继钥匙信号以解锁和启动车辆
prerequisites: Proximity to key fob and vehicle
attack_steps:
1. Position relay device near vehicle
2. Position receiver near key fob
3. Relay signals between devices
4. Unlock and start vehicle
mitigations: UWB ranging, Motion detection in key fob, Signal strength verification

name: Telematics Unit Compromise
name_zh: 车载远程通信单元攻陷
description: Attacker compromises telematics unit to gain remote access to vehicle
description_zh: 攻击者攻陷车载远程通信单元以获得对车辆的远程访问
attack_steps:
1. Identify telematics unit vulnerabilities
2. Exploit vulnerability remotely
3. Gain code execution
4. Pivot to vehicle networks
mitigations: Secure boot, Firmware signing, Network isolation, Vulnerability management

name: Infotainment System Exploitation
description: Attacker exploits IVI vulnerabilities to access vehicle systems
description_zh: 攻击者利用IVI漏洞访问车辆系统
prerequisites: Physical or remote access to IVI
attack_steps:
1. Identify IVI attack surface
2. Exploit web browser or app vulnerability
3. Escape application sandbox
4. Access underlying systems
mitigations: App sandboxing, Secure coding, Regular updates, Network segmentation

name: Firmware Update Attack
description: Attacker modifies or replaces firmware to gain persistent access
description_zh: 攻击者修改或替换固件以获得持久访问
attack_steps:
1. Intercept or access update process
2. Modify firmware image
3. Bypass signature verification
4. Install malicious firmware
mitigations: Code signing, Secure boot, Rollback protection, Update authentication

name: GPS Spoofing
description: Attacker broadcasts fake GPS signals to mislead vehicle navigation
description_zh: 攻击者广播虚假GPS信号以误导车辆导航
attack_steps:
1. Acquire GPS spoofing device
2. Generate fake GPS signals
3. Overpower legitimate signals
4. Mislead vehicle navigation
mitigations: GPS signal authentication, Multi-source positioning, Anomaly detection

name: Bluetooth Attack
description: Attacker exploits Bluetooth vulnerabilities to access vehicle systems
description_zh: 攻击者利用蓝牙漏洞访问车辆系统
attack_steps:
1. Scan for Bluetooth devices
2. Identify vulnerable services
3. Exploit Bluetooth vulnerability
4. Access vehicle systems
mitigations: Disable unused services, Strong pairing, Regular updates, Bluetooth authentication
